dialogue.text: It isn’t long until Ami starts blowing up my phone, because scissor angel forbid that I take a moment to myself in order to get my head straight.
But, now that my neck is broken and I can no longer look from side to side, it’s about time that I head out.
I’m not sure when the next time I’ll be coming back here is. But one thing I {i}do{/i} know is that my presence will cause nothing but problems for everyone now.
I know they’ll understand. And I know they’ll likely be hurt when I don’t wind up calling them, but how {i}could{/i} I when my hands shake every time I pick up my phone?
Her number is still in there. And I know that Ami would happily delete it if I asked her to, but I can’t bring myself to {i}do{/i} that because it’s the only thing I have left.
I wonder who would answer if I were to call that number now. But I don’t wonder for long as I find more comfort pretending it would be the dulcet sound of an infinite dial tone.
I want to grind this machine to pieces and swallow them like capsules so that I may consume and sacrifice everyone I know all at once.
Perhaps that’s what’s needed to carry on without destroying someone else.
All other sacrificial means just seem far too exhausting now.
I make my way through the courtyard.
Ah! There!
But I encounter a barbed tripwire that severs my feet from my body before hoisting me up into a cypress tree where I will be ultimately consumed by a plethora of hungry insects.
See? You all doubted my abilities to predict his actions, but I have played far too many otome games to not know where to find my favorite characters by now.
Oh. It’s you guys.
Shouldn’t you be in class?
We...we all decided to leave. And Miss Imai wasn’t opposed considering today’s...um...{i}circumstances.{/i}
Rin and Molly I’d expect this from. But not you, Futaba. You’re not the type to cut class. Get back in there and...learn things. Or whatever.
What do you mean you’d expect that from me?! When have I ever cut class before?!
‘Tis true that I have been known to skip school in favor of new releases from time to time. Mental health is important after all.
Which...is a good thing to bring up after...everything we just heard from you in there...
Ah, yes.
Yeah, I’m not doing so great right now. But it’s nothing you need to concern yourself with.
Uhh...it kind of {i}is,{/i} dude. This isn’t a thing we can just shrug off. Especially not with Ami on the verge of going fucking postal. I could have sworn Chika was about to slit her throat.
She did. I just finished cleaning up the blood. So, if you’ll please excuse me, I’ll be going home to take a shower now.
Sensei, please don’t make jokes about this. We’re all really worried about you. And we get that you need some time off to handle things, but-
But we’re not really sure if that time should be with {i}Ami.{/i}
You’re more than welcome to come stay with me, Sir. The Kendo Princess and I can share a bed while we wait out the duration of your debuffs.
You can...stay with me too...if you want...but...yeah...Ami is...
She seems kind of...not {i}safe{/i} right now...

Yeah, that’s exactly the issue. She’s going fucking insane and I’m literally the only person in the world who can do anything about it. And I owe her that much after she just looked after me for so long.
Well...what about Ayane? She’s known Ami long enough to be able to help with stuff like this, hasn’t she?
There’s also-
There’s no one else. It has to be me.
And, to be honest, I probably should have noticed this coming and got her help a long time ago. But that would have required me actually {i}helping{/i} in some way, so of course I didn’t.
Now, hold the fuck up before you start going on some annoying rant about how “useless” you think you are. Because you’ve helped me with so much of my shit that I’ve legitimately lost track of it all.
Me as well, Sir. Even if we’ve had our fair share of issues.
People say I’ve been...talking more lately and...I think all of that is thanks to you, Sensei...
And I’ve talked about this subject so many times that I feel like I shouldn’t even bother you with it anymore...
Thanks, guys. I feel a lot better knowing that I’ve made positive impacts on all of you while ignoring the one girl who’s been under my nose this entire time.
You’re welcome!
I think...that was sarcasm, Rin...
Then you’re {i}not{/i} welcome! And you’re also obligated to come hang out with us right now so we can take {i}our{/i} turn to try and make you feel better! {i}Without{/i} locking you in your room!
While I may not entirely agree that time outside of one’s room is necessary to replenish one’s mana, I do believe Nithhala may be correct in recommending such a thing this time, Sir.
It might be a little selfish of us, but...we have a lot we’ve been wanting to talk to you about.
And you haven’t even commented on how awesome my new hair looks yet!
Cool hair, Rin.
Why thank you, Sensei. What a nice thing of you to say completely unprovoked.
You can...wait a little longer before...going back home, can’t you?...
We’ve...already left school, so...it’s not like we have anything else to do now...and...there’s some stuff I want to talk to you about too...so...
And none of this can wait the indeterminate amount of time it will take for me to leave my house again?
We inch closer to death every minute. And so we must savor the few opportunities we have to bond with one another!
Because you never know when the person you love is going to leave you and you don’t want to regret not saying certain things that you probably wish you would have said.
Subtle.
Right...you and Otoha broke up. How are you holding up?
I kissed Sana.
Hahah......hah.....
I feel like the old me would have said something like, “I wish I was there to see it.”
Then...what would the new one say?
I want to fucking die.
Maybe we should invite Miss Watabe too then? You guys have that in common. Maybe she can help?
I think she’s mad at me right now. And again, I’m not hanging out with you guys.
Sure you are. You can shower and get Ami’s blood off of you later. It’s only fair that you come with us now since we were the ones to find you.
We kind of...branched off into teams and...chose different areas outside of the school to wait for you in.
They all doubted me when I suggested the side entrance. But if there’s anything I know about Irish goodbyes, it’s that the back is far more conspicuous from the front. Not a sex joke.
It would have been a terrible one if it was.
I may be a comedic relief character, but I’ve never claimed to be funny, Sir.
You’ll...come with us right?...Just...for a little while?...
Ami’s called me a million times, Sana. She needs me.
Well...have you answered any of those calls yet?
Then...if you haven’t...doesn’t that mean you...{i}don’t{/i} want to see her?...
Just say your phone died! Then we can all go hang out at the cafe for an hour or two and Ami won’t be able to get mad because...you can’t control electricity?
Pweeeeeeeeease?
Rin-
Pweeeeeeeeeease?......
God, you’re good at that.
Oh, he’s done for now. There’s no denying that face.
Sana...
Pwetty pweeeeeeease?...We wub you...
What has happened to you in the two months I’ve been gone?
A lot.
God damn it. My nose is bleeding again, isn’t it?
It appears that our only course of action now is to take Rin to the cafe so we can fix her nosebleed.
Don’t let me die, Dad. I’m too young to leave this world.
Fine.
LET’S FUCKING GOOOOOOOOO!
An excellent choice, Sir!
To the zeppelin! Thunder Bluff awaits!
How about we walk instead? It’ll be faster.
Aspect of the pack, on! Go, go, go, go, go!
Molly is the only one who takes off running, leaving the rest of us to follow behind her at a speed much more suited to my current status as an unmotivated sack of shit.
I don’t want to do this.
But...
I don’t want to see Ami right now either.
I just want to sleep.
But a liquid barrier between that one goal and me is placed on the table just inches from my trembling hands and I realize just how far away sleep is.
And while I want to approach this meeting just as I’d approach a dream-
In my dreams, there’s someone else.
Hey...you good? Still with us?
Huh?
Oh. Yeah. Sorry. Mind just wandered a bit.
When that...happens to you...what’s it like?
What do you mean?
Like...you kind of, like...black out sometimes...don’t you? Are you...seeing anything when that happens?...Or is kind of like...everything just...you know...stops or something?
A little of both, actually. I think. But I rarely ever remember anything I see once I’m brought back to reality.
That’s unfortunate. Not remembering means you can’t even channel those visions into something creative. And I’ve heard that helps a great deal when it comes to battling stress.
Yeah, I think this is a little worse than just “stress.”
Sounds like an interesting power to me, Sir. Almost like time-hopping. You get to slip through the cracks in reality without remembering any of the terrible things you see within them.
I get what you’re saying, though. When my depression kicks in, it’s often like I’m blocking out entire days or...weeks as a whole.
Everything just kind of stops. And it doesn’t pick back up until something pulls me out of it. It just sucks extra hard because the only thing that really {i}can{/i} pull me out of it is time.

So it’s like getting caught in some mini paradox where you need to rely on time to heal, but you have no idea how much time is actually passing because you’ve lost all touch with it. You know what I’m saying?
Almost too well.
Really? Because I feel like that explanation barely scratched the surface of how it actually {i}feels.{/i} But I get that our situations are different.
Yeah. I’m sure you have no shortage of issues yourself right now, though. And I’m sorry I wasn’t around to help you with your breakup situation.
Don’t be. I have Futaba to help with that stuff.
All things considered, Rin handled herself surprisingly well after the first few days. She’s just...still a little bitter. But I’m sure that will go away in time.
Probably not, to be honest. I’ve heard that most people never get over the unwelcome shattering of their first love.
Just kiss Sana a few more times and I’m sure it’ll start to go away.
Weirdly enough, that didn’t do as much for me as I thought it would. So either I’ve ruled out being an exhibitionist, or I just see Sana as more of a friend than sex practice.
Thanks, Rin...I appreciate that.
Yeah, don’t mention it. I just figured it would have been a little more exciting for me considering how many times I’ve fantasized about- I’m going to shut up now.
At least you {i}got{/i} to kiss somebody. Miss Imai rejected me even harder than you did.
Well hey, at least you didn’t force yourself on her. Just look at how much you’ve grown in such a short amount of time.
As it turns out, you receive quite the XP boost after having your heart broken. So at least you have leveling up to look forward to now, Rin.
May your next kiss with a classmate be one that you remember for the rest of your overwhelmingly lesbian life.
And may yours be consensual.
Apart from the breakup and the Christmas party, there isn’t much you’ve missed. Well, other than Miss Imai slowly descending into madness. But we were all kind of doing that, so...
Yeah...she’s made it pretty obvious...just how much she likes you lately...
And she had the...great misfortune of drawing your name for Secret Santa. So I’m sure she’s pretty upset that she wasn’t able to give you anything on account of your...yeah.
You guys still put me on the list despite me being completely MIA for two months?
Heck yeah, we did. We believed in you the whole time, Sensei.
We knew you’d be back eventually. The tough part was just waiting out your absence since we’re all {i}way{/i} more dependent on you than we thought!
Everyone else, maybe. But you seemed to fare pretty well on your own for the...complete duration of your relationship.
But deep down, my heart was screaming, “Sensei! Sensei!”
Cute. But it doesn’t mean much when your actual voice is screaming someone else’s name.
I will not sit here and be blamed for the specific words that escape my mouth at the peak of this very hormonal time in my life.
But I {i}will{/i} sit here and inform you that that time is over and that we can now go back to being the best homies who ever homied because I suddenly have way more free time on my hands.
And I suddenly have almost none.
What do you mean you have none? You’re taking a hiatus from school. That should mean you have plenty of extra time on your hands now.
Unless you’re joining a men’s softball league or something.
Why would...what?
I don’t know. It’s just the first thing my mind went to in my seemingly endless mental battle to not think about Otoha.
I’m...not joining a softball league. I just can’t imagine being in the mood to do {i}anything{/i} in the near future as just moving my body is a chore right now.
Damn. I guess softball really is out of the question then, huh?
I don’t think it’s...a problem if you stay at home, Sensei...
I’d just...like to be able to visit you every now and then...
All of us would. But, given Ami’s current...{i}condition,{/i} maybe it would be best to wait a little while before introducing the idea to her?
I’ve got plenty of new games for you to not be interested in, Sir. I’d love to come share them with you.
Again, thank you guys.
But I’ve got bigger fish to add to my hot pot right now.
That’s...That’s not how that phrase normally goes, is it?
Ooooh hot pot sounds good. Let’s have a hot pot party soon. This place called FoodCo. just opened that-
The rest of our outing carries on normally.
My phone continues to burn holes in my pocket.
{i}Rin’s affection has increased by 10!{/i}
{i}Molly’s affection has increased by 10!{/i}
{i}Futaba’s affection has increased by 10!{/i}
{i}Sana’s affection has increased by 10!{/i}
